title: 我自己开了一个RPG服务器，想让弄一下用户组的权限，求大神教
author: a2208171662
txt_content:
怎么将Builder用户组的tpa    tpahere   spawn    back  的传送权限给禁了 





  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''


大神们也可以给我一个禁传送的权限弄好了的，让我复制一下也行.

replies.author: Krito
replies.txt_content: /mangdelp builder -essentials.tpa     /mangdelp builder -essentials.tpahere spawn和back同样的格式

replies.author: AzhangzhefuA
replies.txt_content:
楼上和楼上的都是禁止。你直接去掉
输入/mangdelp builder essentials.tpa
/mangaddp builder essentials.tpahere
/mangaddp builder essentials.spawn
/mangaddp builder essentials.back

replies.author: qianji20000420
replies.txt_content:
Builder:
     default: true
     permissions: []
     inheritance:
     - default
     - g:essentials_builder
     - g:towny_builder
     - -essentials.tpa
     - -essentials.tphere
     - -essentials.spawn
     - -essentials.back
     info:
       prefix: '&2'
       build: true
       suffix: ''

replies.author: a2208171662
replies.txt_content:
qianji20000420 发表于 2014-9-5 21:17
Builder:
     default: true
     permissions: []
这个能行吗？让该组的玩家不能tpa等。
